label: Completely Paralyzed, Comatose, Unable to Move Without the Aid of Others
Immobile, Stationary with Some Arm Movement, Bedridden or Partially Paralyzed
Constricted Lifestyle, Movement is Limited to a Confined Space, Almost Always Sitting or Laying
Working From Home with Little to No Travel, No Exercise, Some Walking, Mostly Sitting or Laying
Sedentary Lifestyle, Little or No Exercise, Moderate Walking, Desk Job (Away from Home)
Slightly Active, Exercise or Light Sports 1 to 3 Days a Week, Light Jogging or Walking 3 to 4 Days a Week
Lightly Active, Exercise or Moderate Sports 2 to 3 Days a Week, Light Jogging or Walking 5 to 7 Days a Week
Moderately Active, Physical Work, Exercise, or Sports 4 to 5 Days a Week, Construction Laborer
Very Active, Heavy Physical Work, Exercise, or Sports 6 to 7 Days a Week, Hard Laborer
Extremely Active, Very Heavy Physical Work or Exercise Every Day, Professional/Olympic Athlete
